// 设置root的后驱为first                root.prev = null;  // 设置root的前驱为空            }            assert checkInvariants(root);        }    }    /**         * Finds the node starting at root p with the given hash and key.         * The kc argument caches comparableClassFor(key) upon first use         * comparing keys.         */    final TreeNode<K,V> find(int h, Object k, Class<?> kc) {        TreeNode<K,V> p = this;        do {            int ph, dir; K pk;            TreeNode<K,V> pl = p.left, pr = p.right, q;            if ((ph = p.hash) > h) // p节点值大于目标值h                p = pl;            else if (ph < h)　// p节点值小于目标值h                p = pr;            // hash值相同，p节点值等于目标值h            else if ((pk = p.key) == k || (k != null && k.equals(pk)))　                return p;            // hash值相同，键值不同；左子节点为空            else if (pl == null)                 p = pr;　// 查右树            // hash值相同，键值不同；左、右子节点都为空            else if (pr == null)                p = pl;  // 查左树            // hash值相同，键值不同，左右节点都不为空，且键值可比较            else if ((kc != null ||                      (kc = comparableClassFor(k)) != null) &&                     (dir = compareComparables(kc, k, pk)) != 0)                p = (dir < 0) ? pl : pr;            //这里开始的条件仅当输入k=null的时候才会进入，先检查右子树再检查左子树            else if ((q = pr.find(h, k, kc)) != null) // 先检查右节点                return q;            else                p = pl;  // 再检查左节点        } while (p != null);        return null;    }    /**     * Calls find for root node.     * 查找节点，先找到根节点，再找目标节点     */    final TreeNode<K,V> getTreeNode(int h, Object k) {        return ((parent != null) ? root() : this).find(h, k, null);    }    /**         * Tie-breaking utility for ordering insertions when equal         * hashCodes and non-comparable. We don't require a total         * order, just a consistent insertion rule to maintain         * equivalence across rebalancings. Tie-breaking further than         * necessary simplifies testing a bit.         *         * hash值相同时，且值无法比较，可以用这个方法。通过比较identityHashCode值进行排序         */    static int tieBreakOrder(Object a, Object b) {        int d;        // a为空、b为空、a与b的类名相同三个条件中成立一个        if (a == null || b == null ||            (d = a.getClass().getName().             compareTo(b.getClass().getName())) == 0)            // System.identityHashCode的值唯一            d = (System.identityHashCode(a) <= System.identityHashCode(b) ?                 -1 : 1);        return d;    }    /**         * Forms tree of the nodes linked from this node.         * @return root of tree         *          * 树化         */    final void treeify(Node<K,V>[] tab) {        TreeNode<K,V> root = null;        for (TreeNode<K,V> x = this, next; x != null; x = next) {            next = (TreeNode<K,V>)x.next;            x.left = x.right = null; // 重置左右子节点            if (root == null) {　// 确定根节点                x.parent = null;                x.red = false;                root = x;            }            else {                K k = x.key;                int h = x.hash;                Class<?> kc = null;                // 从根节点开始                for (TreeNode<K,V> p = root;;) {                    int dir, ph; // dir表示p与x比较的大小; 1表示p大于x                    K pk = p.key;                    if ((ph = p.hash) > h)                        dir = -1;                    else if (ph < h)                        dir = 1;                    else if ((kc == null &&                              (kc = comparableClassFor(k)) == null) ||                             (dir = compareComparables(kc, k, pk)) == 0)                        dir = tieBreakOrder(k, pk);                    TreeNode<K,V> xp = p;                    if ((p = (dir <= 0) ? p.left : p.right) == null) { // p==null表示到了叶子节点                        x.parent = xp;                        if (dir <= 0)                            xp.left = x;                        else                            xp.right = x;                        root = balanceInsertion(root, x);　// 平衡红黑树                        break;  // 跳出                    }                }            }        }                // 【Q】有什么作用？        moveRootToFront(tab, root); //　确保root为根节点     }    /**         * Returns a list of non-TreeNodes replacing those linked from         * this node.         *         * 树转链表         */    final Node<K,V> untreeify(HashMap<K,V> map) {        Node<K,V> hd = null, tl = null;  // hd为链表的head节点; tl是链表的tail节点        // 从当前TreeNode开始遍历        for (Node<K,V> q = this; q != null; q = q.next) {            Node<K,V> p = map.replacementNode(q, null);　// 用Node节点替换TreeNode            if (tl == null)                hd = p; // 表明为head节点             else                tl.next = p;            tl = p;        }        return hd;    }    /**         * Tree version of putVal.　添加值         */    final TreeNode<K,V> putTreeVal(HashMap<K,V> map, Node<K,V>[] tab,                                   int h, K k, V v) {        Class<?> kc = null;        boolean searched = false;        TreeNode<K,V> root = (parent != null) ? root() : this; // 找到根节点        for (TreeNode<K,V> p = root;;) {            int dir, ph; K pk;  // dir表示大小比较　　ph表示节点hash值 pk表示节点key　             if ((ph = p.hash) > h)                dir = -1;            else if (ph < h)                dir = 1;            // 当前节点值等于key，直接返回            // 【Q】为什么直接返回，为什么不赋值？            // 【A】因为在键值存在的情况下，有多种更新策略，所以直接返回，后续处理            else if ((pk = p.key) == k || (k != null && k.equals(pk)))                return p;            // 值无法比较时,或者比较结果相等            else if ((kc == null &&                      (kc = comparableClassFor(k)) == null) ||                     (dir = compareComparables(kc, k, pk)) == 0) {　                if (!searched) {                    TreeNode<K,V> q, ch;                    searched = true;                    // 在左右子节点需要当前目标节点                    if (((ch = p.left) != null &&                         (q = ch.find(h, k, kc)) != null) ||                        ((ch = p.right) != null &&                         (q = ch.find(h, k, kc)) != null))                        return q;                }                // 未查到，进一步用identifyHashCode判断大小                dir = tieBreakOrder(k, pk);            }            TreeNode<K,V> xp = p;            // 插入节点            if ((p = (dir <= 0) ? p.left : p.right) == null) {                Node<K,V> xpn = xp.next;                TreeNode<K,V> x = map.newTreeNode(h, k, v, xpn);                if (dir <= 0)                    xp.left = x;                else                    xp.right = x;                xp.next = x;                x.parent = x.prev = xp;                if (xpn != null)                    ((TreeNode<K,V>)xpn).prev = x;                // 平衡红黑树，并确保第一个节点是根节点                moveRootToFront(tab, balanceInsertion(root, x));                return null;            }        }    }    /**         * Removes the given node, that must be present before this call.         * This is messier than typical red-black deletion code because we         * cannot swap the contents of an interior node with a leaf         * successor that is pinned by "next" pointers that are accessible         * independently during traversal. So instead we swap the tree         * linkages. If the current tree appears to have too few nodes,         * the bin is converted back to a plain bin. (The test triggers         * somewhere between 2 and 6 nodes, depending on tree structure).         */    //    // 删除当前TreeNode    final void removeTreeNode(HashMap<K,V> map, Node<K,V>[] tab,                              boolean movable) {        int n;        if (tab == null || (n = tab.length) == 0)            return;        int index = (n - 1) & hash;        TreeNode<K,V> first = (TreeNode<K,V>)tab[index], root = first, rl;        TreeNode<K,V> succ = (TreeNode<K,V>)next, pred = prev; // 当前节点的前驱、后继         if (pred == null)　// 前驱节点为空，表明当前为根节点            tab[index] = first = succ; 后继节点提升为根节点        else            pred.next = succ; // 前驱节点直接连接后继节点        if (succ != null)　　　// 后继节点不为空            succ.prev = pred; // 前驱节点直接连接后继节点        if (first == null)　// 若节点删除后，根节点为空，直接返回            return;        if (root.parent != null)  // 找到根节点            root = root.root();        if (root == null || root.right == null ||            (rl = root.left) == null || rl.left == null) {            tab[index] = first.untreeify(map);  // too small 节点数较小，转换为链表            return;        }        TreeNode<K,V> p = this, pl = left, pr = right, replacement;        if (pl != null && pr != null) {　// p不为叶子节点, 且左右节点均不为空            TreeNode<K,V> s = pr, sl;            while ((sl = s.left) != null) // find successor　找到后继节点                s = sl;            boolean c = s.red; s.red = p.red; p.red = c; // swap colors　交换节点颜色            TreeNode<K,V> sr = s.right;　            TreeNode<K,V> pp = p.parent;            if (s == pr) { // p was s's direct parent　s的父节点是p,直接交换                p.parent = s;                s.right = p;            }            else {                TreeNode<K,V> sp = s.parent;                if ((p.parent = sp) != null) { // 将p的父节点换为sp                    if (s == sp.left)                        sp.left = p;                    else                        sp.right = p;                }                if ((s.right = pr) != null) // 设置s、pr的父子节点关系                    pr.parent = s;              }            p.left = null;            if ((p.right = sr) != null) // 设置p、sr的父子关系,此时p的值小于sr,p小于s(但p在s的右节点上)                sr.parent = p;            if ((s.left = pl) != null)  // 设置s、pl的父子关系                pl.parent = s;            if ((s.parent = pp) == null) // s为根节点(原始p为根节点)                root = s;            else if (p == pp.left) // 处理pp、s的父子节点关系                pp.left = s;            else                pp.right = s;            if (sr != null)　　//　此刻, s与p已经完成交换。sr不为空时，需要进一步处理p与sr                replacement = sr;            else                replacement = p;        }        else if (pl != null)　 // p的左子节点不为空，右子节点为空            replacement = pl;        else if (pr != null) // p的左子节点为空，右子节点不为空            replacement = pr;        else　// p的左右子节点均为空            replacement = p;        if (replacement != p) {　// 直接去掉p节点，连接p的父节点与子节点            TreeNode<K,V> pp = replacement.parent = p.parent;            if (pp == null)                root = replacement;            else if (p == pp.left)                pp.left = replacement;            else                pp.right = replacement;            p.left = p.right = p.parent = null;        }        // 平衡红黑树。        // 若p节点为红色，删除一个红色节点，树始终平衡        // 若p为黑色，相当于删除了一个黑色节点，树失去平衡        TreeNode<K,V> r = p.red ? root : balanceDeletion(root, replacement);        if (replacement == p) {  // detach　直接删除p节点            TreeNode<K,V> pp = p.parent;            p.parent = null;            if (pp != null) {                if (p == pp.left)                    pp.left = null;                else if (p == pp.right)                    pp.right = null;            }        }        // 将根节点移动到第一个元素上【?】        if (movable)            moveRootToFront(tab, r);    }    /**         * Splits nodes in a tree bin into lower and upper tree bins,         * or untreeifies if now too small. Called only from resize;         * see above discussion about split bits and indices.         *         * @param map the map         * @param tab the table for recording bin heads         * @param index the index of the table being split　红黑树在tab中的位置         * @param bit the bit of hash to split on　// 数组容量(旧)         */        // 红黑树拆分 用于resize    // 拆分为高位红黑树和低位红黑树    final void split(HashMap<K,V> map, Node<K,V>[] tab, int index, int bit) {        TreeNode<K,V> b = this;  // 当前节点        // Relink into lo and hi lists, preserving order        TreeNode<K,V> loHead = null, loTail = null; // 高位　head节点　tail节点        TreeNode<K,V> hiHead = null, hiTail = null; // 低位　head节点　tail节点        int lc = 0, hc = 0; // 高位、低位节点数量        for (TreeNode<K,V> e = b, next; e != null; e = next) {            next = (TreeNode<K,V>)e.next;            e.next = null;            if ((e.hash & bit) == 0) { // 低位                if ((e.prev = loTail) == null)                    loHead = e;                else　                    loTail.next = e;                loTail = e;                ++lc;            }            else { // 高位                if ((e.prev = hiTail) == null)                    hiHead = e;                else                    hiTail.next = e;                hiTail = e;                ++hc;            }        }// 低位链表不为空        if (loHead != null) {            if (lc <= UNTREEIFY_THRESHOLD) // UNTREEIFY_THRESHOLD为6，lc小于这个值,树转链表                tab[index] = loHead.untreeify(map);            else {                tab[index] = loHead;                if (hiHead != null) // (else is already treeified)                    loHead.treeify(tab);　// 树化tab            }        }        if (hiHead != null) {  // 同上            if (hc <= UNTREEIFY_THRESHOLD)                tab[index + bit] = hiHead.untreeify(map);            else {                tab[index + bit] = hiHead;                if (loHead != null)                    hiHead.treeify(tab);            }        }    }    /* ------------------------------------------------------------ */    // Red-black tree methods, all adapted from CLR// 左旋    //   pp                pp      //    |                |    //　  p                 r    //  /  \              /       //      r            p    //     /              \     //    rl               r1    static <K,V> TreeNode<K,V> rotateLeft(TreeNode<K,V> root,                                          TreeNode<K,V> p) {        TreeNode<K,V> r, pp, rl;        if (p != null && (r = p.right) != null) { // r为p的右子节点            if ((rl = p.right = r.left) != null)                 rl.parent = p;            if ((pp = r.parent = p.parent) == null)                (root = r).red = false;            else if (pp.left == p)                pp.left = r;            else                pp.right = r;            r.left = p;            p.parent = r;        }        return root;    }    // 右旋    //        pp                pp      //         |                |    //　       p                 l    //       /  \              /   \     //      l                       p    //        \                   /     //         r1               r1    static <K,V> TreeNode<K,V> rotateRight(TreeNode<K,V> root,                                           TreeNode<K,V> p) {        TreeNode<K,V> l, pp, lr;        if (p != null && (l = p.left) != null) {            if ((lr = p.left = l.right) != null)                lr.parent = p;            if ((pp = l.parent = p.parent) == null)                (root = l).red = false;            else if (pp.right == p)                pp.right = l;            else                pp.left = l;            l.right = p;            p.parent = l;        }        return root;    }    // 插入后平衡红黑树    // x为插入节点    static <K,V> TreeNode<K,V> balanceInsertion(TreeNode<K,V> root,                                                TreeNode<K,V> x) {        x.red = true;  // 默认设置为红色        for (TreeNode<K,V> xp, xpp, xppl, xppr;;) {            if ((xp = x.parent) == null) { // x的父节点为空，表示x为根节点                x.red = false;  // 根节点设置为黑色                return x;            }            else if (!xp.red || (xpp = xp.parent) == null) // x的父节点为黑色或者xp为根节点                return root;            if (xp == (xppl = xpp.left)) {                if ((xppr = xpp.right) != null && xppr.red) {                    xppr.red = false;                    xp.red = false;                    xpp.red = true;                    x = xpp;                }                else {                    if (x == xp.right) {                        root = rotateLeft(root, x = xp);                        xpp = (xp = x.parent) == null ? null : xp.parent;                    }                    if (xp != null) {                        xp.red = false;                        if (xpp != null) {                            xpp.red = true;                            root = rotateRight(root, xpp);                        }                    }                }            }            else {                if (xppl != null && xppl.red) {                    xppl.red = false;                    xp.red = false;                    xpp.red = true;                    x = xpp;                }                else {                    if (x == xp.left) {                        root = rotateRight(root, x = xp);                        xpp = (xp = x.parent) == null ? null : xp.parent;                    }                    if (xp != null) {                        xp.red = false;                        if (xpp != null) {                            xpp.red = true;                            root = rotateLeft(root, xpp);                        }                    }                }            }        }    }    // 删除后 平衡红黑树    // x可能是被删除节点的后续节点，也可能是被删除节点    // 被删除的节点是黑色，才需要平衡红黑树    static <K,V> TreeNode<K,V> balanceDeletion(TreeNode<K,V> root,                                               TreeNode<K,V> x) {        for (TreeNode<K,V> xp, xpl, xpr;;)  {            if (x == null || x == root) // x节点为空，或者根节点，直接返回                return root;            else if ((xp = x.parent) == null) {  // x为根节点, 直接返回                x.red = false;                return x;            }            else if (x.red) {  // x所在的子树缺少一个黑色节点，将x变成黑色，可以平衡红黑树                x.red = false;                return root;            }            else if ((xpl = xp.left) == x) {　// x在左子树                if ((xpr = xp.right) != null && xpr.red) { // x的兄弟节点为红色,需要左旋达到局部平衡                    xpr.red = false;                    xp.red = true;                    root = rotateLeft(root, xp); // 左旋                    xpr = (xp = x.parent) == null ? null : xp.right;                }                if (xpr == null)  // xpr为空时，xpr的子树已到达平衡                    x = xp; // 上移，递归                else {                    TreeNode<K,V> sl = xpr.left, sr = xpr.right;                    if ((sr == null || !sr.red) &&  // x的侄子节点同为空或者同为黑树时                         (sl == null || !sl.red)) {                        xpr.red = true; // 设置x的兄弟节点为红色, xp的右子树少一个黑色节点，xp到达平衡                        x = xp;　// 上移，递归                    }                    else {  // 此时说明x的侄子节点至少有一个为红色，可以利用这个节点到达xp的平衡（整树都平衡了）                        if (sr == null || !sr.red) { // sr为红色,需要先右旋                            if (sl != null)                                sl.red = false;                            xpr.red = true;                            root = rotateRight(root, xpr);                            xpr = (xp = x.parent) == null ?                                null : xp.right;                        }                        if (xpr != null) {                            xpr.red = (xp == null) ? false : xp.red;                            if ((sr = xpr.right) != null)                                sr.red = false;                        }                        if (xp != null) {                            xp.red = false;                            root = rotateLeft(root, xp);　// 左旋，平衡                        }                        x = root;                    }                }            }            else { // symmetric　右树                if (xpl != null && xpl.red) {                    xpl.red = false;                    xp.red = true;                    root = rotateRight(root, xp);                    xpl = (xp = x.parent) == null ? null : xp.left;                }                if (xpl == null)                    x = xp;                else {                    TreeNode<K,V> sl = xpl.left, sr = xpl.right;                    if ((sl == null || !sl.red) &&                        (sr == null || !sr.red)) {                        xpl.red = true;                        x = xp;                    }                    else {                        if (sl == null || !sl.red) {                            if (sr != null)                                sr.red = false;                            xpl.red = true;                            root = rotateLeft(root, xpl);                            xpl = (xp = x.parent) == null ?                                null : xp.left;                        }                        if (xpl != null) {                            xpl.red = (xp == null) ? false : xp.red;                            if ((sl = xpl.left) != null)                                sl.red = false;                        }                        if (xp != null) {                            xp.red = false;                            root = rotateRight(root, xp);                        }                        x = root;                    }                }            }        }    }    /**         * Recursive invariant check　递归检查树节点         */    static <K,V> boolean checkInvariants(TreeNode<K,V> t) {        TreeNode<K,V> tp = t.parent, tl = t.left, tr = t.right,        tb = t.prev, tn = (TreeNode<K,V>)t.next;        // 检查前驱        if (tb != null && tb.next != t)            return false;        // 检查后驱        if (tn != null && tn.prev != t)            return false;        // 检查父节点关系        if (tp != null && t != tp.left && t != tp.right)            return false;        // 检查左子节点        if (tl != null && (tl.parent != t || tl.hash > t.hash))            return false;        // 检查右子节点        if (tr != null && (tr.parent != t || tr.hash < t.hash))            return false;        // 检查规则：两个连续节点不能同时为红色        if (t.red && tl != null && tl.red && tr != null && tr.red)            return false;        // 递归检查左子节点        if (tl != null && !checkInvariants(tl))            return false;        // 递归检查右子节点        if (tr != null && !checkInvariants(tr))            return false;        return true;    }}

三、静态方法/工具方法

1.计算哈希值

static final int hash(Object key) {    int h;    // 键值的hashCode值与其高16位异或(无进位相加)    return (key == null) ? 0 : (h = key.hashCode()) ^ (h >>> 16);}

2.获取Comparable实现类的类型

static Class<?> comparableClassFor(Object x) {    // 如果x不是Comparable的实例，直接返回    if (x instanceof Comparable) {        Class<?> c; Type[] ts, as; Type t; ParameterizedType p;        // 如果是String类型，返回        if ((c = x.getClass()) == String.class) // bypass checks            return c;        // x继承的接口不为空        if ((ts = c.getGenericInterfaces()) != null) {            for (int i = 0; i < ts.length; ++i) {                // 接口中包含泛型，类型为Comparable，且只有一个类为c 【???】                if (((t = ts[i]) instanceof ParameterizedType) &&                    ((p = (ParameterizedType)t).getRawType() ==                     Comparable.class) &&                    (as = p.getActualTypeArguments()) != null &&                    as.length == 1 && as[0] == c) // type arg is c                    return c;            }        }    }    return null;}

3.比较类

/**     * Returns k.compareTo(x) if x matches kc (k's screened comparable     * class), else 0.     */@SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes","unchecked"}) // for cast to Comparablestatic int compareComparables(Class<?> kc, Object k, Object x) {    return (x == null || x.getClass() != kc ? 0 :            ((Comparable)k).compareTo(x));}

4.将值转化为2的次方

/**  * Returns a power of two size for the given target capacity.  * 举例: cap = 7 -> n = 6  *     n         11xx  *   n>>>1       01xx  *   n|=n>>>1    11xx  -> n = 11xx  *  *     n         11xx  *   n>>>2       0011  *   n|=n>>>2    1111  -> n = 1111  */static final int tableSizeFor(int cap) {    int n = cap - 1;    n |= n >>> 1;    n |= n >>> 2;    n |= n >>> 4;    n |= n >>> 8;    n |= n >>> 16;    return (n < 0) ? 1 : (n >= MAXIMUM_CAPACITY) ? MAXIMUM_CAPACITY : n + 1;}

四、实例变量

// 数据存储数组transient Node<K,V>[] table;// entrySettransient Set<Map.Entry<K,V>> entrySet;// map的长度transient int size;// 集合修改次数, 与线程安全有关transient int modCount; /**     * The next size value at which to resize (capacity * load factor).     *     * @serial     */// (The javadoc description is true upon serialization.// Additionally, if the table array has not been allocated, this// field holds the initial array capacity, or zero signifying// DEFAULT_INITIAL_CAPACITY.)int threshold;/**     * The load factor for the hash table.     *     * @serial     */// 负载因子，表示空间的利用率；超过 capacity * loadFactor时会扩容final float loadFactor;

五、构造方法

// initialCapacity: 初始化容量// loadFactor: 负载因子public HashMap(int initialCapacity, float loadFactor) {    if (initialCapacity < 0)        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Illegal initial capacity: " +                                           initialCapacity);    if (initialCapacity > MAXIMUM_CAPACITY)        initialCapacity = MAXIMUM_CAPACITY;    if (loadFactor <= 0 || Float.isNaN(loadFactor))  // Float.isNan会不会多余了？        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Illegal load factor: " +                                           loadFactor);    this.loadFactor = loadFactor;  // 不可直接修改    this.threshold = tableSizeFor(initialCapacity);  // 将初始化容量变为2的次方}// initialCapacity: 初始化容量public HashMap(int initialCapacity) {    this(initialCapacity, DEFAULT_LOAD_FACTOR); // loadFactor: 负载因子用默认值0.75}public HashMap() {    this.loadFactor = DEFAULT_LOAD_FACTOR; // 只设置了负载因子为默认值0.75，未设置容量}// 构造参数为Mappublic HashMap(Map<? extends K, ? extends V> m) {    this.loadFactor = DEFAULT_LOAD_FACTOR;    putMapEntries(m, false);  // 添加元素}

六、实例方法

1.putAll方法

// putAllpublic void putAll(Map<? extends K, ? extends V> m) {    putMapEntries(m, true);}// 用于构造参数为Map类型的构造方法: HashMap(Map<? extends K, ? extends V> m)// 以及Map.putAll方法// evict: 用于构造参数为Map类型的构造方法时传false，其他情况传true，将会// 传递给afterNodeInsertion方法final void putMapEntries(Map<? extends K, ? extends V> m, boolean evict) {    int s = m.size();    if (s > 0) {         // 情况一：数组为空        if (table == null) {            // m的长度和负载因子决定数组容量            // 加上1.0F的原始是防止在s / loadFactor < 1情况下，容量不为0            float ft = ((float)s / loadFactor) + 1.0F;             int t = ((ft < (float)MAXIMUM_CAPACITY) ?                     (int)ft : MAXIMUM_CAPACITY);            if (t > threshold)                threshold = tableSizeFor(t);        }        // 情况二：数组长度超过阀值        else if (s > threshold)            resize(); // 扩容        // 变量，添加键值对        for (Map.Entry<? extends K, ? extends V> e : m.entrySet()) {            K key = e.getKey();            V value = e.getValue();            putVal(hash(key), key, value, false, evict); // 添加键值对        }    }}// 添加值final V putVal(int hash, K key, V value, boolean onlyIfAbsent,               boolean evict) {    // tab是table的引用    Node<K,V>[] tab; Node<K,V> p; int n, i;    if ((tab = table) == null || (n = tab.length) == 0)  // table为空或者无数据        n = (tab = resize()).length;  // resize    if ((p = tab[i = (n - 1) & hash]) == null)  // 数组索引位置为空, 直接插入        tab[i] = newNode(hash, key, value, null);    else { // 数组索引位置不为空, 存在三种情况：一个值、链表、红黑树        Node<K,V> e; K k;        // 一个值情况        if (p.hash == hash &&            ((k = p.key) == key || (key != null && key.equals(k))))            e = p;        // 红黑树情况        else if (p instanceof TreeNode)            e = ((TreeNode<K,V>)p).putTreeVal(this, tab, hash, key, value);        // 链表情况        else {            // 遍历链表; 两种情况: 找到相同key、未找到相同key            for (int binCount = 0; ; ++binCount) { // binCount节点数                if ((e = p.next) == null) {                    p.next = newNode(hash, key, value, null); // 未找到相同key, 在末尾添加节点                    if (binCount >= TREEIFY_THRESHOLD - 1) // -1 for 1st  // 超过阀值, 转换为树结构                        treeifyBin(tab, hash);                    break;                }                if (e.hash == hash &&                    ((k = e.key) == key || (key != null && key.equals(k)))) // 找到相同的key                    break;                p = e;            }        }        if (e != null) { // existing mapping for key            V oldValue = e.value;            if (!onlyIfAbsent || oldValue == null)  //　是否替换旧值value                e.value = value;            afterNodeAccess(e);            return oldValue;        }    }    ++modCount;    if (++size > threshold)  // size超过阀值, resize        resize();    afterNodeInsertion(evict);    return null;}

2.数组长度、判空

public int size() {    return size;}public boolean isEmpty() {    return size == 0;}

3.根据键获取值、判断是否含有键、判段是否含有值

// get方法，实际上调用getNode方法// 【Q】入参类型为什么用Object而不是泛型？public V get(Object key) {    Node<K,V> e;    return (e = getNode(hash(key), key)) == null ? null : e.value;}final Node<K,V> getNode(int hash, Object key) {    Node<K,V>[] tab; Node<K,V> first, e; int n; K k;    if ((tab = table) != null && (n = tab.length) > 0 &&        (first = tab[(n - 1) & hash]) != null) {  // table不为空，且索引位置不为空        // 有三种情况: 一个值、链表、红黑树        if (first.hash == hash && // always check first node            ((k = first.key) == key || (key != null && key.equals(k)))) // hash值相等且key值相同,直接返回            return first;        if ((e = first.next) != null) {            // 红黑树            if (first instanceof TreeNode)                return ((TreeNode<K,V>)first).getTreeNode(hash, key);            // 链表            do {                if (e.hash == hash &&                    ((k = e.key) == key || (key != null && key.equals(k))))                    return e;            } while ((e = e.next) != null);        }    }    return null;}// 是否包含key值public boolean containsKey(Object key) {    return getNode(hash(key), key) != null;}// 是否存在value值public boolean containsValue(Object value) {    Node<K,V>[] tab; V v;    // tab是对table的引用    //【Q】为什么不直接变量table, 而采用引用的方式?    //【A】    if ((tab = table) != null && size > 0) {        // 先深度后广度遍历        for (int i = 0; i < tab.length; ++i) {            for (Node<K,V> e = tab[i]; e != null; e = e.next) {                if ((v = e.value) == value ||                    (value != null && value.equals(v)))                    return true;            }        }    }    return false;}

4.扩容

final Node<K,V>[] resize() {    Node<K,V>[] oldTab = table;    int oldCap = (oldTab == null) ? 0 : oldTab.length;    int oldThr = threshold;    int newCap, newThr = 0;    if (oldCap > 0) {  // 当前table有值        if (oldCap >= MAXIMUM_CAPACITY) { // 判断数组长度是否超过域值, 超过直接返回            threshold = Integer.MAX_VALUE;            return oldTab;        }        else if ((newCap = oldCap << 1) < MAXIMUM_CAPACITY &&                 oldCap >= DEFAULT_INITIAL_CAPACITY)            newThr = oldThr << 1; // double threshold    }    // table没有值, 并且设置size阀值    else if (oldThr > 0) // initial capacity was placed in threshold        newCap = oldThr;    // table没有值, 未设置size阀值    else {               // zero initial threshold signifies using defaults        newCap = DEFAULT_INITIAL_CAPACITY;        newThr = (int)(DEFAULT_LOAD_FACTOR * DEFAULT_INITIAL_CAPACITY);    }    // 如果阀值为0    if (newThr == 0) {        float ft = (float)newCap * loadFactor;        newThr = (newCap < MAXIMUM_CAPACITY && ft < (float)MAXIMUM_CAPACITY ?                  (int)ft : Integer.MAX_VALUE);    }    threshold = newThr;    @SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes","unchecked"})    Node<K,V>[] newTab = (Node<K,V>[])new Node[newCap];    table = newTab;    if (oldTab != null) {        for (int j = 0; j < oldCap; ++j) { // 遍历旧table            Node<K,V> e;            if ((e = oldTab[j]) != null) {                oldTab[j] = null;  // 方便gc                if (e.next == null)  // 数组索引位置只有一个值的情况                    newTab[e.hash & (newCap - 1)] = e;                else if (e instanceof TreeNode)  // 红黑树情况                    //　这里包含树转链表操作                    ((TreeNode<K,V>)e).split(this, newTab, j, oldCap);                // 链表情况                else { // preserve order                    Node<K,V> loHead = null, loTail = null;                    Node<K,V> hiHead = null, hiTail = null;                    Node<K,V> next;                    do {                        next = e.next;                        // 高一位是否有值                        // 原始索引位置 hash & (n - 1)                        // 新的索引位置 hash & (2 * n - 1)                        // 在老链表中, 同一索引位置的key是否迁移到新的位置(当前索引位置+n),                        // 只用判断　hash & n　是否为0, 如果为0,表示不迁移,为1表示迁移                        // 例子: oldCap = 16  newCap = 32                        // key = 4 20 36都在索引4位置                        // old:                        // n-1 1111   n-1 01111  n-1 001111                        //  4  0100    20 10100   36 100100                        //  &  0100     & 00100    & 000100                        // new:                        // n-1 11111   n-1 11111  n-1 011111                        //  4  00100    20 10100   36 100100                        //  &  00100    &  10100    & 000100                        // key=20需要迁移, key=4,36保持在原来位置                        if ((e.hash & oldCap) == 0) {                            if (loTail == null)                                loHead = e;                            else                                loTail.next = e;                            loTail = e;                        }                        //                        else {                            if (hiTail == null)                                hiHead = e;                            else                                hiTail.next = e;                            hiTail = e;                        }                    } while ((e = next) != null);                    if (loTail != null) {                        loTail.next = null;                        newTab[j] = loHead;                    }                    if (hiTail != null) {                        hiTail.next = null;                        newTab[j + oldCap] = hiHead;                    }                }            }        }    }    return newTab;}

5.删除

// 对外方法public V remove(Object key) {    Node<K,V> e;    // 实际执行removeNode方法    return (e = removeNode(hash(key), key, null, false, true)) == null ?        null : e.value;}// 第一个参数 hash: hash值// 第二个参数 key: 键值// 第三个参数 value: 值// 第四个参数 matchValue: 需要键、值同时匹配时，才可以删除// 第五个参数 movable: 删除节点时，是否移动其他节点；为否时表示不移动其他节点final Node<K,V> removeNode(int hash, Object key, Object value,                           boolean matchValue, boolean movable) {    Node<K,V>[] tab; Node<K,V> p; int n, index;    if ((tab = table) != null && (n = tab.length) > 0 &&        (p = tab[index = (n - 1) & hash]) != null) {  // 判断是否有值        Node<K,V> node = null, e; K k; V v;        // 第一个值为目标值        // 这一段代码主要是为了找到目表位置        if (p.hash == hash &&            ((k = p.key) == key || (key != null && key.equals(k))))            node = p;        // 第一个值不是目标值, 且链表或者树        else if ((e = p.next) != null) {            // 树            if (p instanceof TreeNode)                node = ((TreeNode<K,V>)p).getTreeNode(hash, key);            else {                // 链表                do {                    if (e.hash == hash &&                        ((k = e.key) == key ||                         (key != null && key.equals(k)))) {                        node = e;                        break;                    }                    p = e;                } while ((e = e.next) != null);            }        }        // 两种情况：        //   1. matchValue为false, 表示不需要判断value值是否匹配；即键相等即可        //   2. matchValue为true, 且value相等；即键、值都相等        if (node != null && (!matchValue || (v = node.value) == value ||                             (value != null && value.equals(v)))) {            // 目标为树节点            if (node instanceof TreeNode)                ((TreeNode<K,V>)node).removeTreeNode(this, tab, movable);            // 目标为第一个节点(索引位置可能为一个节点, 也可能为多个节点)            else if (node == p)                tab[index] = node.next;            // 目标不为第一个节点            else                p.next = node.next;            ++modCount;            --size;            // 这里为什么没有由红黑树转化为链表的判断?            afterNodeRemoval(node);            return node;        }    }    return null;}// 清除所有节点public void clear() {    Node<K,V>[] tab;    modCount++;    if ((tab = table) != null && size > 0) {        size = 0;        for (int i = 0; i < tab.length; ++i)            tab[i] = null;　// 引用为空即可    }}

6.entrySet、keySet、values

public Set<Map.Entry<K,V>> entrySet() {    Set<Map.Entry<K,V>> es;    return (es = entrySet) == null ? (entrySet = new EntrySet()) : es;}public Set<K> keySet() {    Set<K> ks;    return (ks = keySet) == null ? (keySet = new KeySet()) : ks;}// 返回一个Collectionpublic Collection<V> values() {    Collection<V> vs;    return (vs = values) == null ? (values = new Values()) : vs;}

7.树化

/**     * Replaces all linked nodes in bin at index for given hash unless     * table is too small, in which case resizes instead.     */final void treeifyBin(Node<K,V>[] tab, int hash) {    int n, index; Node<K,V> e;    if (tab == null || (n = tab.length) < MIN_TREEIFY_CAPACITY)        resize();    else if ((e = tab[index = (n - 1) & hash]) != null) {        TreeNode<K,V> hd = null, tl = null;        do {            TreeNode<K,V> p = replacementTreeNode(e, null);            if (tl == null)                hd = p;            else {                p.prev = tl;                tl.next = p;            }            tl = p;        } while ((e = e.next) != null);        if ((tab[index] = hd) != null)            hd.treeify(tab);    }}

8.继承自Map方法

// 获取值，可设置默认值@Overridepublic V getOrDefault(Object key, V defaultValue) {    Node<K,V> e;    return (e = getNode(hash(key), key)) == null ? defaultValue : e.value;}// 只有Map中没有键值时，才能插入节点@Overridepublic V putIfAbsent(K key, V value) {    return putVal(hash(key), key, value, true, true);}// 键、值都匹配时，才删除节点@Overridepublic boolean remove(Object key, Object value) {    return removeNode(hash(key), key, value, true, true) != null;}// 如果键值对在Map中，替换value值@Overridepublic boolean replace(K key, V oldValue, V newValue) {    Node<K,V> e; V v;    if ((e = getNode(hash(key), key)) != null &&        ((v = e.value) == oldValue || (v != null && v.equals(oldValue)))) {        e.value = newValue;        afterNodeAccess(e);        return true;    }    return false;}// 键值存在于Map中，替换value值@Overridepublic V replace(K key, V value) {    Node<K,V> e;    if ((e = getNode(hash(key), key)) != null) {        V oldValue = e.value;        e.value = value;        afterNodeAccess(e);        return oldValue;    }    return null;}// 当键值不存在，或者键值存在但value值为null时，// 以键值作为参数通过mappingFunction函数生成value值// Function<T, R> 接受一个类型的参数，返回不同类型的值@Overridepublic V computeIfAbsent(K key,                         Function<? super K, ? extends V> mappingFunction) {    if (mappingFunction == null)        throw new NullPointerException();    int hash = hash(key);    Node<K,V>[] tab; Node<K,V> first; int n, i;    int binCount = 0;    TreeNode<K,V> t = null;    Node<K,V> old = null;　// 键值为key的节点，可能不存在    if (size > threshold || (tab = table) == null ||        (n = tab.length) == 0)        n = (tab = resize()).length;    if ((first = tab[i = (n - 1) & hash]) != null) {        if (first instanceof TreeNode)            old = (t = (TreeNode<K,V>)first).getTreeNode(hash, key);        else {            Node<K,V> e = first; K k;            do {                if (e.hash == hash &&                    ((k = e.key) == key || (key != null && key.equals(k)))) {                    old = e;                    break;                }                ++binCount;            } while ((e = e.next) != null);        }        V oldValue;        // 如果存在value值，且不为空时，直接返回        if (old != null && (oldValue = old.value) != null) {            afterNodeAccess(old);            return oldValue;        }    }    V v = mappingFunction.apply(key);  // 键值作为参数    // value值为空，不插入    if (v == null) {        return null;    // 键值为key的节点存在，且value为空    } else if (old != null) {        old.value = v;        afterNodeAccess(old);        return v;    } // 键值不存在，但hash对应的节点是红黑树    else if (t != null)        t.putTreeVal(this, tab, hash, key, v);    else {  // 键值不存在, hash对应的节点是单节点或者链表        tab[i] = newNode(hash, key, v, first);        if (binCount >= TREEIFY_THRESHOLD - 1)            treeifyBin(tab, hash);    }    ++modCount;    ++size;    afterNodeInsertion(true);    return v;}// 如果键值存在，且对应的value值不为空,// 将键值、value值作为remappingFunction的参数形成新的value值。// 如果新的value值不为空，更新；如果为空删除节点// BiFunction<T,U, R> 接受两个不同类型参数，返回不同类型结果// bi-前缀：表示双的意思public V computeIfPresent(K key,                          BiFunction<? super K, ? super V, ? extends V> remappingFunction) {    if (remappingFunction == null)        throw new NullPointerException();    Node<K,V> e; V oldValue;    int hash = hash(key);    if ((e = getNode(hash, key)) != null &&        (oldValue = e.value) != null) {        V v = remappingFunction.apply(key, oldValue);        if (v != null) {            e.value = v;  // 更新节点            afterNodeAccess(e);            return v;        }        else            removeNode(hash, key, null, false, true);　// 删除节点    }    return null;}// computeIfAbsent与computeIfPresent结合体@Overridepublic V compute(K key,                 BiFunction<? super K, ? super V, ? extends V> remappingFunction) {    if (remappingFunction == null)        throw new NullPointerException();    int hash = hash(key);    Node<K,V>[] tab; Node<K,V> first; int n, i;    int binCount = 0;    TreeNode<K,V> t = null;    Node<K,V> old = null;    if (size > threshold || (tab = table) == null ||        (n = tab.length) == 0)        n = (tab = resize()).length;    if ((first = tab[i = (n - 1) & hash]) != null) {        if (first instanceof TreeNode)            old = (t = (TreeNode<K,V>)first).getTreeNode(hash, key);        else {            Node<K,V> e = first; K k;            do {                if (e.hash == hash &&                    ((k = e.key) == key || (key != null && key.equals(k)))) {                    old = e;                    break;                }                ++binCount;            } while ((e = e.next) != null);        }    }    V oldValue = (old == null) ? null : old.value;    V v = remappingFunction.apply(key, oldValue);    if (old != null) {        if (v != null) {            old.value = v;            afterNodeAccess(old);        }        else            removeNode(hash, key, null, false, true);    }    else if (v != null) {        if (t != null)            t.putTreeVal(this, tab, hash, key, v);        else {            tab[i] = newNode(hash, key, v, first);            if (binCount >= TREEIFY_THRESHOLD - 1)                treeifyBin(tab, hash);        }        ++modCount;        ++size;        afterNodeInsertion(true);    }    return v;}// 类似compute// 以旧的value和新的value为参数，用remappingFunction计算出新的value值@Overridepublic V merge(K key, V value,               BiFunction<? super V, ? super V, ? extends V> remappingFunction) {    if (value == null)        throw new NullPointerException();    if (remappingFunction == null)        throw new NullPointerException();    int hash = hash(key);    Node<K,V>[] tab; Node<K,V> first; int n, i;    int binCount = 0;    TreeNode<K,V> t = null;    Node<K,V> old = null;    if (size > threshold || (tab = table) == null ||        (n = tab.length) == 0)        n = (tab = resize()).length;    if ((first = tab[i = (n - 1) & hash]) != null) {        if (first instanceof TreeNode)            old = (t = (TreeNode<K,V>)first).getTreeNode(hash, key);        else {            Node<K,V> e = first; K k;            do {                if (e.hash == hash &&                    ((k = e.key) == key || (key != null && key.equals(k)))) {                    old = e;                    break;                }                ++binCount;            } while ((e = e.next) != null);        }    }    if (old != null) {        V v;        if (old.value != null)            v = remappingFunction.apply(old.value, value);        else            v = value;        if (v != null) {            old.value = v;            afterNodeAccess(old);        }        else            removeNode(hash, key, null, false, true);        return v;    }    if (value != null) {        if (t != null)            t.putTreeVal(this, tab, hash, key, value);        else {            tab[i] = newNode(hash, key, value, first);            if (binCount >= TREEIFY_THRESHOLD - 1)                treeifyBin(tab, hash);        }        ++modCount;        ++size;        afterNodeInsertion(true);    }    return value;}// 遍历table,先深度后广度, action可以接受两个参数：key、value@Overridepublic void forEach(BiConsumer<? super K, ? super V> action) {    Node<K,V>[] tab;    if (action == null)        throw new NullPointerException();    if (size > 0 && (tab = table) != null) {        int mc = modCount;        for (int i = 0; i < tab.length; ++i) {            for (Node<K,V> e = tab[i]; e != null; e = e.next)                action.accept(e.key, e.value);        }        if (modCount != mc)            throw new ConcurrentModificationException();    }}// 遍历table, 替换所有的value，// 以key、旧value为参数，按function生成的新value，替换旧value@Overridepublic void replaceAll(BiFunction<? super K, ? super V, ? extends V> function) {    Node<K,V>[] tab;    if (function == null)        throw new NullPointerException();    if (size > 0 && (tab = table) != null) {        int mc = modCount;        for (int i = 0; i < tab.length; ++i) {            for (Node<K,V> e = tab[i]; e != null; e = e.next) {                e.value = function.apply(e.key, e.value);            }        }        if (modCount != mc)            throw new ConcurrentModificationException();    }}

9. clone

@Overridepublic Object clone() {    HashMap<K,V> result;    try {        result = (HashMap<K,V>)super.clone();    } catch (CloneNotSupportedException e) {        // this shouldn't happen, since we are Cloneable        throw new InternalError(e);    }    result.reinitialize();　// 重置    result.putMapEntries(this, false);    return result;}// 重置void reinitialize() {        table = null;        entrySet = null;        keySet = null;        values = null;        modCount = 0;        threshold = 0;        size = 0;    }

10.序列化

final float loadFactor() { return loadFactor; }final int capacity() {    return (table != null) ? table.length :    (threshold > 0) ? threshold :    DEFAULT_INITIAL_CAPACITY;}void internalWriteEntries(java.io.ObjectOutputStream s) throws IOException {    Node<K,V>[] tab;    if (size > 0 && (tab = table) != null) {        for (int i = 0; i < tab.length; ++i) {            for (Node<K,V> e = tab[i]; e != null; e = e.next) {                s.writeObject(e.key); // 写入key                s.writeObject(e.value); // 写入value            }        }    }}// 写private void writeObject(java.io.ObjectOutputStream s)    throws IOException {    int buckets = capacity();　// 容量    // Write out the threshold, loadfactor, and any hidden stuff    s.defaultWriteObject();    s.writeInt(buckets);    s.writeInt(size);    internalWriteEntries(s);}// 读private void readObject(java.io.ObjectInputStream s)    throws IOException, ClassNotFoundException {    // Read in the threshold (ignored), loadfactor, and any hidden stuff    s.defaultReadObject();    reinitialize(); // 重置    if (loadFactor <= 0 || Float.isNaN(loadFactor))        throw new InvalidObjectException("Illegal load factor: " +                                         loadFactor);    s.readInt();                // Read and ignore number of buckets    int mappings = s.readInt(); // Read number of mappings (size)    if (mappings < 0)        throw new InvalidObjectException("Illegal mappings count: " +                                         mappings);    else if (mappings > 0) { // (if zero, use defaults)        // Size the table using given load factor only if within        // range of 0.25...4.0        float lf = Math.min(Math.max(0.25f, loadFactor), 4.0f);        float fc = (float)mappings / lf + 1.0f;        int cap = ((fc < DEFAULT_INITIAL_CAPACITY) ?                   DEFAULT_INITIAL_CAPACITY :                   (fc >= MAXIMUM_CAPACITY) ?                   MAXIMUM_CAPACITY :                   tableSizeFor((int)fc));        float ft = (float)cap * lf;        threshold = ((cap < MAXIMUM_CAPACITY && ft < MAXIMUM_CAPACITY) ?                     (int)ft : Integer.MAX_VALUE);        @SuppressWarnings({"rawtypes","unchecked"})        Node<K,V>[] tab = (Node<K,V>[])new Node[cap];        table = tab;        // Read the keys and values, and put the mappings in the HashMap        for (int i = 0; i < mappings; i++) {            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")            K key = (K) s.readObject();            @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")            V value = (V) s.readObject();            putVal(hash(key), key, value, false, false);        }    }}

11.节点操作

// 创建一个节点Node<K,V> newNode(int hash, K key, V value, Node<K,V> next) {    return new Node<>(hash, key, value, next);}// 树状节点转为普通节点// 【?】没理解Node<K,V> replacementNode(Node<K,V> p, Node<K,V> next) {    return new Node<>(p.hash, p.key, p.value, next);}// 生成树节点TreeNode<K,V> newTreeNode(int hash, K key, V value, Node<K,V> next) {    return new TreeNode<>(hash, key, value, next);}// 树化TreeNode<K,V> replacementTreeNode(Node<K,V> p, Node<K,V> next) {    return new TreeNode<>(p.hash, p.key, p.value, next);}

12.回调方法

// Callbacks to allow LinkedHashMap post-actionsvoid afterNodeAccess(Node<K,V> p) { }void afterNodeInsertion(boolean evict) { }void afterNodeRemoval(Node<K,V> p) { }

entry.title: 复制git最后一次提交的commit id至剪切板
entry.content:
1.环境：ubuntu

2.安装xsel

sudo apt install xsel

3.自定义shell方法

function glc() {  h=`git rev-parse --short HEAD`  # 最后一次提交的hash值  v=`git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'%Cred%h%Creset'`　# 最后一次提交的hash值　带颜色　  echo $h | tr -d "
" | xsel -b　# 复制至剪切板, tr -d "
"的作用是去掉结尾的换行符  #v=`glg -1 | grep commit | awk "print \$2" | tr -d "
" | xsel -b`  echo "GET LAST COMMIT ID [ $v ] FROM:"  echo `git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'commit %Cred%H%Creset'`  echo `git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'Author: %cn %ce'`  echo `git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'Date: %cd'`  echo "
	" `git log -n 1 --pretty=format:'%s'`}

使用：

glc

效果：

GET LAST COMMIT ID [ 60ce1702d ] FROM:commit 60ce1702d66da72df3229c0f7c2dd70c53a5bc22Author: pangzi pangzi@emial.comDate: Sat Nov 13 19:23:41 2021 +0800         last commit

ctr + v :

60ce1702d

entry.title: 自定义UDAF
entry.content:
1.定义Accumulator

// SumUdfAccumulator.javaimport org.apache.flink.table.api.dataview.ListView;public class SumUdfAccumulator {  public ListView<Double> list = new ListView<>();  public double sum;}

2.定义UDAF

// SumUdf.javaimport java.util.List;import org.apache.flink.table.api.dataview.ListView;import org.apache.flink.table.functions.AggregateFunction;import org.slf4j.Logger;import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;public class SumUdf extends AggregateFunction<Double, SumUdfAccumulator> {  public static final Logger LOG = LoggerFactory.getLogger(SumUdf.class);  @Override  public Double getValue(SumUdfAccumulator accumulator) {    return accumulator.sum;  }  @Override  public SumUdfAccumulator createAccumulator() {    return new SumUdfAccumulator();  }  public void accumulate(SumUdfAccumulator accumulator, Double value) throws Exception {    ListView<Double> listView = accumulator.list;    List<Double> list = listView.getList();    Double sumValue = 0d;       if (list.size() > 0 && null != list.get(0)) {      sumValue = list.get(0) + value;      list.set(0, sumValue);    } else {      list.add(value);    }          listView.setList(list);    accumulator.sum = sumValue;    LOG.info("ListView=" + list.toString());  }}

entry.title: HashMap理解
entry.content:
1.概括

HashMap本质上是有数组构成的，利用一些算法，实现了查询时间复杂度为O(1)功能

transient Node<K,V>[] table;

2.寻址

// hash为hash算法的结果// n为数组table的长度，值为2 ^ i，hash & (n - 1)  // 相当于取模

寻址就是根据hash算法的结果在table数组中找到索引位置。例如：

// 数组长度为8，数字10应该再数字的哪个位置？// (10 - 1) % 8 = 1， 索引1的位置数组           10数组位置    01234567

3.Hash算法

static final int hash(Object key) {        int h;        return (key == null) ? 0 : (h = key.hashCode()) ^ (h >>> 16);    }

这段代码是对键值进行hash化，为寻址做铺垫。主要的操作是对键值的hash值与其高16位进行异或操作；异或操作相当于不带进位的加法二进制操作，也就是最终的hash结果为键值的hash值与高16位的二进制之和。

h               1111  1111  1111  1111  1111  1010  0111  1100h >>> 16        0000  0000  0000  0000  1111  1111  1111  1111h ^ (h >>> 16)  1111  1111  1111  1111  0000  0101  1000  0011

为什么要这么做？为什么不直接用键值的hash呢？
hash值为int类型，共32位。这样做是为了保留同时保留高16位和低16位的特征，使hash结果更加均匀，减小寻址冲突的概率；比如

数组长度16，现在有两个值8，24， hash值用8位表示不移位方式:24   0001 1000   // 原始值15   0000 1111   // 数组长度-1&    0000 1000   // 结果为88    0000 1000   // 815   0000 1111   // 数字长度-1 &    0000 1000   // 结果为8此时8，24位于索引8位置移位方式:h         0001 1000   // 原始值24h >>> 4   0000 0001   // 1^         0001 1001   // 异或结果为25n         0000 1111   // 数组长度-1等于15&         0000 1001   // 结果为9h         0000 1000   // 原始值8h >>> 4   0000 0000   // 0^         0000 1000   // 异或结果为8n         0000 1111   // 数组长度-1等于15&         0000 1000   // 结果为8移位之后，24的索引位置是9，8的索引位置是8

4.Hash冲突

当多个hash值相同时就出现了hash冲突，此时会形成一个链表，当取值时会遍历整个链表，比对每一个key值。当链表长度达到一定长度时，会转换为红黑树。
​

5.扩容

当table的长度达到一定长度时，会自动扩容，遍历每一个元素，重新计算索引位置

entry.title: seafile安装与备份恢复
entry.content:
一、准备工作

1.安装docker
2.安装docker-compose
3.安装ossutil【非必须】

二、安装

docker-compose.yml

version: '2.0'services:  db:    image: mariadb:10.5    container_name: seafile-mysql    environment:      - MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=mysql密码  # Requested, set the root's password of MySQL service.      - MYSQL_LOG_CONSOLE=true    volumes:      - /home/ubuntu/backup-mysql:/var/lib/mysql  # Requested, specifies the path to MySQL data persistent store.    networks:      - seafile-net  memcached:    image: memcached:1.5.6    container_name: seafile-memcached    entrypoint: memcached -m 256    networks:      - seafile-net  seafile:    image: seafileltd/seafile-mc:latest    container_name: seafile    ports:      - "8000:80"#      - "8001:443"  # If https is enabled, cancel the comment.    volumes:      - /home/ubuntu/backup:/shared   # Requested, specifies the path to Seafile data persistent store.    environment:      - DB_HOST=db      - DB_ROOT_PASSWD=mysql密码  # Requested, the value shuold be root's password of MySQL service.      - TIME_ZONE=Asia/Shanghai # Optional, default is UTC. Should be uncomment and set to your local time zone.      - SEAFILE_ADMIN_EMAIL=邮箱 # Specifies Seafile admin user, default is 'me@example.com'.      - SEAFILE_ADMIN_PASSWORD=用户名     # Specifies Seafile admin password, default is 'asecret'.      - SEAFILE_SERVER_LETSENCRYPT=false   # Whether use letsencrypt to generate cert.      - SEAFILE_SERVER_HOSTNAME=网址 # Specifies your host name.    depends_on:      - db      - memcached    networks:      - seafile-netnetworks:  seafile-net:

需要修改的地方:

MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD=mysql密码  # 如 cpzt123DB_ROOT_PASSWD=mysql密码  # 如 cpzt123SEAFILE_ADMIN_EMAIL=邮箱  # 如 cpzt@gmail.comSEAFILE_ADMIN_PASSWORD=用户名  # 如 cpzt123SEAFILE_SERVER_HOSTNAME=网址  # 如 127.0.0.1:8000 ,这里的端口号一定要加上

三、备份与恢复

1.数据备份

backup.sh

#!/bin/bashBASE_DIR="$HOME/test"DIRNAME="seafile_backup_`date +%Y%m%d%H%M`"ROOT_DIR="$BASE_DIR/$DIRNAME"DB_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/db"SRC_DIR="$HOME/backup"helpFunc() {  echo "Usage:"  echo "backup.sh [-d] [-u]"  echo "Description:"  echo "-d, 只保留打包文件"  echo "-u, 上传oss"}IS_DELETE_DIR=false;IS_UPLOAD=false;while getopts 'h d u' OPT; do  case $OPT in    d) IS_DELETE_DIR=true;;    u) IS_UPLOAD=true;;    h) helpFunc & exit 0;;    ?) helpFunc & exit 0;;  esacdoneecho $IS_DELETE_DIR;# 创建目录echo "创建备份目录: $ROOT_DIR"mkdir $ROOT_DIRmkdir $DB_DIRecho "备份数据库"cd $DB_DIRdocker exec -it seafile-mysql mysqldump -uroot -pchim --opt ccnet_db > ccnet_db.sqldocker exec -it seafile-mysql mysqldump -uroot -pchim --opt seafile_db > seafile_db.sqldocker exec -it seafile-mysql mysqldump -uroot -pchim --opt seahub_db > seahub_db.sqlecho "备份seafile数据"sudo cp -rf $SRC_DIR/seafile $ROOT_DIRecho "压缩打包"cd $BASE_DIRsudo tar zcf "$DIRNAME.tar.gz" $DIRNAMEif [ "$IS_DELETE_DIR" = true ]  then sudo rm -rf $ROOT_DIR & echo "删除原始文件"fiif [ "$IS_UPLOAD" = true ]  then ossutil64 cp $DIRNAME.tar.gz oss://你的ossbuckt/ & echo "上传oss成功"fiecho "完成备份"exit 0

需要修改的地方:

if [ "$IS_UPLOAD" = true ]  then ossutil64 cp $DIRNAME.tar.gz oss://你的ossbuckt/ & echo "上传oss成功"fi# 替换 你的oosbuckt

使用：

./backup.sh -d -u

2.恢复

recover.sh

#!/bin/bashROOT_DIR=$(cd $1; pwd)if [ -d $ROOT_DIR ]   then echo "$ROOT_DIR"else   echo "目录不存在"   exit 1fiDB_DIR="$ROOT_DIR/db"echo '恢复数据库'cd $DB_DIRdocker cp ccnet_db.sql seafile-mysql:/tmp/ccnet_db.sqldocker cp seafile_db.sql seafile-mysql:/tmp/seafile_db.sqldocker cp seahub_db.sql seafile-mysql:/tmp/seahub_db.sqldocker exec -it seafile-mysql /bin/sh -c "mysql -uroot -pchim ccnet_db < /tmp/ccnet_db.sql"docker exec -it seafile-mysql /bin/sh -c "mysql -uroot -pchim seafile_db < /tmp/seafile_db.sql"docker exec -it seafile-mysql /bin/sh -c "mysql -uroot -pchim seahub_db < /tmp/seahub_db.sql"echo '恢复seafile数据'cd $ROOT_DIRecho `pwd`sudo cp -rf seafile/* $HOME/backup/seafile/

使用：

./recover.sh -d 备份文件目录

entry.title: python多重赋值问题
entry.content:
以前遇到一个多重赋值问题，只是觉得结果很是蹊跷就记录了下来。搁置很久偶然再次发现，决定分析一下。问题如下：

a = [5, 4, 3, 2, 1]a[0], a[a[0] - 1] = a[a[0] - 1], a[0]  # 交换之后 a = [5, 4, 3, 2, 1]

这段代码的意图是交换第一个值a[0]和最后一个值a[4]，期望的结果是[1, 4, 3, 2, 5]，实际结果数组没有做任何改变。
这个问题的关键在多重赋值的执行顺序，是先执行右边，还是先执行左边？或者是左右交替执行完成赋值？在python中，在进行变量赋值时_，_总是对右边进行充分评估；也就是说先执行右边。相当于先将a[a[0] - 1]
的结果赋值给一个变量x，a[0]的结果赋值给变量y，即

x = a[a[0] - 1]   # x = a[5 - 1] = 1y = a[0]          # y = 5

等式左边的执行顺序是按从左至右依次执行的。先处理a[0]，可以得到值为1。再处理a[a[0] - 1]，这里先要处理a[0] - 1，这里的a[0]是5还是1？按照执行顺序，应该是1， 所以可以得到a[a[0] - 1]本质上是a[0]，将y赋给它，值为5。因此执行完列表a的结果没有变化。

a[0] = x  # a[0] = 1a[a[0] - 1] = y  # a[1 - 1] = a[0] = 5

再看另一个例子:

t = [-10,-3,-100,-1000,-239,1]# 交换 -10和1的位置t[5], t[t[5]-1] = t[t[5]-1], t[5]

结果:

indexError: list assignment index out of range
>>> t[-10, -3, -100, -1000, -239, -10]

最后提醒一下，尽量不在在等式右边写复杂的嵌套，很容易出问题。

entry.title: 设计模式之单例
entry.content:
1.单例

  • 简单单例(线程不安全)

    public class Singleton {private static Singleton uniqueInstance;        public static Singleton getInstance() {    if (null == uniqueInstance) {        uniqueInstance = new Singleton();        }        return uniqueInstance;    }}

  • 加锁单例(线程安全)

    public class Singleton {private static Singleton uniqueInstance;        public static synchronized Singleton getInstance() {    if (null == uniqueInstance) {        uniqueInstance = new Singleton();        }        return uniqueInstance;    }

  • 编译时创建实例(线程安全)

    public class Singleton {private static Singleton uniqueInstance = new Singleton();        public static Singleton getInstance() {        return uniqueInstance;    }

  • 双重检查加锁(线程安全)

    public class Singleton {private volatile static Singleton uniqueInstance;        public static Singleton getInstance() {    if (null == uniqueInstance) {            synchronized (Singleton.class) {                if (null == uniqueInstance) {            uniqueInstance = new Singleton();                }            }        }        return uniqueInstance;    }
